2 Steps to get more done in less time!

Schwab Talks Talent hosted by the Operations Talent Acquisition Team. Join us for One-on-one online chats with members of Schwab's Talent Acquisition team Thursday, November 30th from 2-3pm Mountain Time.
What will you do tomorrow morning?

-The Talent Attraction and Programs team include both community relations and program management responsibilities within Talent Acquisition. -I focus on building fruitful relationships with local non-profits, college campuses, diversity, veteran and professional groups, workforce connections and other community partners. -I feed the talent pipeline at the "large end of the funnel", delivering high quality talent to Schwab Talent Advisors by creating awareness of Schwab's openings, brand and culture in the Phoenix area.

-I support the Operations Enterprise and partner with the Talent Advisors to recruit for Phoenix, Denver, El Paso and Orlando.-I manage the Employee Referral Network for the Operations Enterprise. These referrals fill 60% of our positions. -Actively source, screen and interview candidates while maintaining an 80% pass through rate. -Participate in building a relationship with the local community by attending job fairs at various locations.-Build a strong business acumen within the firm to find the best fit possible for each referral that shows interest in the Operations Enterprise.Interested in a career at Charles Schwab? Our current openings are available at aboutschwab.com/careers

Discover Financial Services (NYSE: DFS) is a direct banking and payment services company with one of the most recognized brands in U.S. financial services. Since its inception in 1986, the company has become one of the largest card issuers in the United States. The company operates the Discover card, America's cash rewards pioneer, and offers personal and student loans, online savings products, certificates of deposit and money market accounts through its Discover Bank subsidiary. Its payment businesses consist of Discover Network, with millions of merchant and cash access locations; PULSE, one of the nation's leading ATM/debit networks; and Diners Club International, a global payments network with acceptance in more than 185 countries and territories. Summary: Operate as a Human Resource partner by actively engaging in all areas of recruitment, acting as a change agent and working with all levels of management to enhance organizational effectiveness. Assist business unit(s) in achieving business and people objectives. -As a Recruiting Coordinator, I am mainly responsible for supporting the development of HR processes and recruiting initiatives in a high volume recruiting capacity.-Initiate background checks and drug screens upon acceptance of offers; act as point of contact for this on-boarding process. Manage candidates in the applicant tracking system. - Prepare new hire materials and coordinate new hire orientation. Create and send out offer packages. -Initiate, lead and execute various staffing based projects to promote and enhance the overall performance of the staffing department and business results; provide training, coaching and mentoring to new coordinators.-Ensure that all staffing activities are consistent with company policy

DataSphere Technologies, Inc. Is the leading provider of online neighborhood content and advertising in the United States. We work with major media companies such as Gannett, Raycom Media, Hubbard Broadcasting, Fisher Communications and Local TV to provide up-to-date information about what’s happening in over 1,000 individual neighborhoods, in more than 70 cities covering almost half of the US population. DataSphere is growing explosively; and led by a team of internet veterans from Amazon, IMDb, Microsoft and RealNetworks, who will continue making the sky the limit!*Recently named, Top Ten Best Places to Work in the Valley by The Phoenix Business Journal- December 2011
